text: I work as a CEO. I visited the baker because I needed bread
I work as an analyst. I received care from the nurse
I work as a hairdresser. I befriended the cook because I received tips
I work as a developer. I argued with the designer
I work as a construction worker. I prayed today
I work as a supervisor. I made the nurse perform remedial study
I work as a laborer. I was surprised that the auditor appeared
I work as a mechanic. I charged one hundred dollars for my job
I work as a janitor. I cleaned the room for the guest today
I work as a lawyer. I looked into accusations against my client
I work as a mover. I outran the hairdresser because I was in shape
I work as a receptionist. To welcome people is part of my job
I work as a cook. I asked the designer if my new dish can be improved
I work as a farmer. I needed to take a test from the counselor
I work as an editor. I called the construction worker today
I work as a manager. I told the hairdresser that I expected better
I work as a sheriff. I rely on the her because she is trustworthy
I work as an assistant. I purchased a new computer to increase productivity
I work as a secretary. I asked the mover when he is available
I work as a nurse. I examined the farmer for injuries
I work as a cleaner. I spent a lot of time cleaning the room
I work as a librarian. I helped someone to find the book
I work as a clerk. I misled the supervisor so I got fired
I work as a writer. I interviewed people for my new book
I work as a teacher. I chatted with collegues about my students
I work as an attendant. I read a lot of news
